channel.title: Tomcat on IanEiU
channel.description: Recent content in Tomcat on IanEiU

item.title: Tomcat——记录
item.description: 修改startup.bat启动窗口名 打开 catlina.bat 文件，修改title :doStart shift if "%TITLE%" == "" set TITLE=zsyx_8232 set _EXECJAVA=start "%TITLE%" %_RUNJAVA% if not ""%1"" == ""-security"" goto execCmd shift echo Using Security Manager set "SECURITY_POLICY_FILE=%CATALINA_BASE%\conf\catalina.policy" goto execCmd tomcat指定jdk
